transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan bolo.
Customer: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Utkarsh Acharaya IndiaMART se. Sir, ek aapka concern aaya hai aapne matlab video meeting ke liye aapne concern raise kiya hai.
Executive: To kal ka time mujhe notification aa gaya to maine abhi confirm kiya tha usko.
Customer: Achcha matlab abhi matlab yaha pe aaya tha na concern open ho jata hai. To agar video meeting ki kuch aapko requirement hai to abhi video meeting kar sakte hain, bataiye aap.
Customer: Kar sakte hain abhi bhi, koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Haan, aapko matlab haan yaha pe aapne concern open kar diya tha na isliye. Thik hai main aapko main aapke isi number pe link share kar de raha hun.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik, thik sir. Laptop pe lijiyega na wo.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Laptop ya desktop pe lijiyega na wo zoom agar aapko kuch hai.
Executive: Nahi kya wo aapko WhatsApp pe jayega, mail pe jayega na link.
Customer: Haan thik hai na.
Executive: Thik, thik bhejta hun.
Customer: To
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer raised a concern for video meeting.

Resolution:

- Executive offered to conduct video meeting.
- Executive shared the meeting link on customer's number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, concern, link sharing
